response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $9,500. This special price is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to the market value of $10,000. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for immediate delivery. I look forward to serving you and ensuring your satisfaction with our product.", "product_price": 9500}
